returns.position: The full Position struct with tokensOwed0/1 patched

returns.positions: Array of full Position structs with updated fees

params.first: Maximum number of positions to return
params.skip: Number of positions to skip from the start of the list
params.user: Owner address whose positions to query

returns.positions: Array of Position structs (at most `first` long)

getPosition(address,uint256).notice: Returns a single position with up-to-date fees owed

getPositions(address,uint256[]).notice: Returns multiple positions with live fee updates

getUserPositions(address,address,uint256.notice: Returns paginated positions owned by `user`, with live fee updates

userdoc.notice: Helper contract to fetch Uniswap V3 positions with live fee accruals.
